title: LF Ranked Team High Silver to Low Gold
body:
Hey everyone I'm considering on making a new ranked team since ranked 5's are back.

What I'm looking for is players that are in a High Silver to Gold, I do wish to see commitment from the players that can sort out times and days that we can play and work together as a team.

Highly Prefer voice comm such as Team Speak, Skype or even Discord.

Roles can be Switched around during normal's for practice however ranked will be different for how we feel comfortable with.
Mainly want to see everyone get along with each other, know our play style and learn what we can do better with each other so taking positive and negative feedback.

If you feel like this is a good way for you to work in a team more better, Please add me JoshJackJJ

Thank you
